mapper.select: SELECT thn, thtid, tha, ths, thd, tcategory, CONS_SCHE_STARTDATE, CONS_SCHE_ENDDATE, CONS_SCHE_CONTENT FROM teamhistory, team, constructionschedule WHERE thtid = #{detailTeamId} AND thtid = tid AND CONS_SCHE_TEAMID = tid

SELECT (SELECT count(*) from constructionschedule WHERE CONS_SCHE_STARTDATE BETWEEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YY/MM/DD') AND LAST_DAY(SYSDATE) AND THTID = CONS_SCHE_TEAMID ) as tmonthWork, (SELECT count(*) from constructionschedule WHERE CONS_SCHE_STARTDATE BETWEEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YY/MM/DD') AND NEXT_DAY(SYSDATE, 1)) as tweekWork, (SELECT CASE WHEN count(*) >= 1 then '작업중' WHEN count(*) = 0 then '휴게중' END from constructionschedule WHERE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YY/MM/DD') BETWEEN CONS_SCHE_STARTDATE AND CONS_SCHE_ENDDATE) as tnowWork, (SELECT tcategory from team WHERE thtid = tid) as tcategory, ROUND(AVG(ths),2) as ths, THTID FROM constructionschedule, teamhistory, team WHERE THTID = TID GROUP BY THTID ORDER BY ths DESC
